title: Student Privacy Protection Strategies in Online Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Strengthening personal information protection competencies when performing online mathematics learning activities in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can identify and explain the scope of personal information collection on online learning platforms.
Learners can list at least three scenarios of potential personal information leaks during math learning activities and propose preventive measures.
Learners can apply at least two practical tools and settings to protect personal information in smartphone environments.

resources: Mobile-Friendly Personal Information Protection Guide Document
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
